price: 3.  (Wuxuu sidoo kale u diray) kuwo kale oo ka mid ah aan weli ku soo biirin. Allena waa Aadkaadaha Sare, Xikmadda Badan.
arabic: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَمَّا يَلۡحَقُواْ بِهِمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waākharīna min'hum lammā yalḥaqū bihim wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
